revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: U. S. Grant, General U. S.A.
Secretary of the War ad interim.

The papers covered by your letter of the 4th inst. requesting the Attorney General to institute proceedings for the recovery of a sum due to the United States from the
South western Iron Company, for rations furnished to the employés of said company, has been appropriately referred to the Solicitor of the Treasury.
